538050.name: The baron got you again
538050.description:
The baron got you again is an Escape the Room game.

In The baron got you again you play as a secret agent, prisonner from a cell in the middle of Argentina, inside the secret base of the vile Baron Von Rimmel. Your mission : escape, and as fast as possible. Search the different rooms to discover the bunker's exit without being noticed.

The game requires a minimum Room Scale of 2 by 1.5 meters, but a Room Scale of 4 by 3 meters provided with a greater experience.
The game only support the HTC Vive.
538050.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
